title: Jacqueline Jossa and Dan Osborne look loved-up on family day out to Legoland
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Jacqueline Jossa and Dan Osborne put any rumours of marital woes behind them with a fun family day out.

The couple, who have been married since 2017, took their daughters Ella, four, and Mia, one, and Dan's son Teddy, five, to Legoland Windsor on Saturday.

Looking loved-up, they seemed to be having a blast as they enjoyed all the rides with their brood.

Jacqueline, 26, went for a casual look in a navy hoodie and ripped jeans, which she wore with fresh white trainers and a white cross body bag.

Her brunette locks were worn in a ponytail and she kept her makeup to a minimum.

Dan looked relaxed in grey jogging bottoms, a black t-shirt and matching trainers.

He wore a black jumper draped around his shoulders as he enjoyed dad duties.

The gang were seen posing for snaps with characters and taking selfies around the resort.

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

Dan and Jacqueline shared a few laughs between them as they took in the sights.

Their day out comes after a difficult year for the pair.

In August Dan was seen leaving a nightclub with a woman he denied having an affair with.

The former TOWIE star denied he was seeing Steph Ledigo behind his wife's back.

They have had a rocky marriage since tying the knot in 2017. The pair started dating in 2013.

Dan has been accused of cheating on numerous occasions, but insists that this isn't true and his relationship with Jacqueline is fine.
description: The couple took their daughters Ella, four, and Mia, one, and Dan's son Teddy, five, out for a fun day at the theme park
